GapFillInput.Title: Tense sequence
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verbs in brackets into the correct form.

Content.Question:
1. When I saw the look on Lauren’s face, I knew (know) that she had passed her finals exams.
2. Tamara tells|told|has told|'s told (tell) me you write travel books.
3. Frances told me that her grandfather would|will (will) give her some pocket money this week.
4. It was my father who felt it was important that the whole family go|went (go) to church
on Sundays, which is something we still do.
5. ‘I’ve decided to take a year out and travel around Australia,’ Caitlin announced (announce).
6. As soon as I heard (hear) the phone, I knew it would be Jess to let us know she’d arrived in Thailand.
7. From our very first meeting, I felt (feel) there was something rather sad about Isobel.
8. I spoke to Henri earlier on today, and he said you weren't coming (not / come) to the theatre this evening.
9. It was my mother who felt that we must all have (have) lunch together at least twice a month.
10. Greg tells me that you aren't|'re not (not / be) happy in your job because of the long hours.
